chapters.title: Chapter 3: A Fan of Colors
chapters.info: Edesina Azzedin, p. 149 (168)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She was sent to Tarabon to attempt to restore order there, and was later captured by the Seanchan. She was a prisoner in the Royal Palace of Altara, held by the collar of a damane, but was released by Mat and now travels with him and with Luca's show. She is slim and handsome, with black hair to her waist.
